Languages.Language 1: Understands Deep Speech and Undercommon but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 14 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Eye Ray, The Beholder Zombie's Eye Stalks have mostly decomposed with time, but some of its descriptive rays remain intact
Other Actions.Action 2: Paralyzing Ray, The Beholder Zombie attempts to paralyze a target
Other Actions.Action 3: Fear Ray, The Beholder Zombie attempts to frighten a target
Other Actions.Action 4: Enervation Ray, The Beholder Zombie blasts a target with a necrotic ray
Other Actions.Action 5: Disintigration Ray, The Beholder Zombie blasts a target with a force ray, disintigrating objects and any creature it kills

Abilities.Ability 1: Undead Fortitude, If an attack would destroy the Zombie, it instead makes a Constitution saving throw, surviving with 1 HP if it succeeds.  Radiant damage and Holy Water ignore this effect
